mapper.select: SELECT P.NO , C.MAIN_CATEGORY , C.SUB_CATEGORY , P.TITLE , P.STATUS_NO , PS.STATUS FROM PROJECT P JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_NO = C.NO JOIN PROJECT_STATUS PS ON PS.NO = P.STATUS_NO ORDER BY P.NO DESC

SELECT P.NO NO , C.MAIN_CATEGORY MAIN_CATEGORY , C.SUB_CATEGORY SUB_CATEGORY , M.NAME MEMBER_NAME , P.TITLE TITLE , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(P.GOAL_AMOUNT)), '(\d{3})', '\1,')), '^,', '') GOAL_AMOUNT , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(P.CURRENT_AMOUNT)), '(\d{3})', '\1,')), '^,', '') CURRENT_AMOUNT , P.IMAGE_URL IMAGE_URL , P.OK_YN OK_YN , P.OK_DATE OK_DATE , P.ENROLL_DATE ENROLL_DATE , P.START_DATE START_DATE , P.END_DATE END_DATE , P.CAL_DATE CAL_DATE , P.DELETE_YN DELETE_YN , R.NO REWARD_NO , R.AMOUNT REWARD_AMOUNT , R.NAME REWARD_NAME , SI.BANK_NAME , SI.NAME , SI.ACCOUNT_NUM FROM PROJECT P JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_NO = C.NO JOIN PROJECT_STATUS PS ON PS.NO = P.STATUS_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = P.MEMBER_NO JOIN REWARD R ON R.PROJECT_NO = P.NO JOIN SETTLEMENT_INFO SI ON SI.PROJECT_NO = P.NO WHERE P.NO = #{projectNo}
